description: Lists all the trusted token issuers configured in an instance of IAM Identity Center.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the instance of IAM Identity Center with the trusted token issuer configurations that you want to list.

nested_items.name: TrustedTokenIssuers
nested_items.description: An array list of the trusted token issuer configurations.

nested_items.name: TrustedTokenIssuerArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the trusted token issuer configuration in the instance of IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the trusted token issuer configuration in the instance of IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: TrustedTokenIssuerType
nested_items.description: The type of trusted token issuer.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
